00169     void setMode(GuiMode newMode)
00170     {
00171       if (newMode==GM_Inventory && allowed==GW_None)
00172         return;
00173 
00174       mode = newMode;
00175       updateVisible();

00182     bool isGuiMode() const { return getMode() != GM_Game; }
00183 
00184     // Disallow all inventory mode windows
00185     void disallowAll()
00186     {
00187       allowed = GW_None;
00188       updateVisible();
00189     }
00190 
00191     // Allow one or more windows
00192     void allow(GuiWindow wnd)
00193     {
00194       allowed = (GuiWindow)(allowed | wnd);
00195       updateVisible();
00196     }

00295   template<typename T>
00296   void WindowManager::removeDialog(T*& dialog)
00297   {
00298       OEngine::GUI::Layout *d = static_cast<OEngine::GUI::Layout*>(dialog);
00299       removeDialog(d);
00300       dialog = 0;
00301   }
